headline: Nasdaq Correction: The Best Magnificent Seven Stock to Buy on the Dip Right Now
summary: The technology-heavy Nasdaq Composite index currently finds itself in correction territory.  There is a chance the recent pullback will turn into something worse, such as a prolonged bear market.  Over the past 10 years, the Nasdaq has corrected six times, good for about once every 1.67 years.

headline: 3 Essential AI Infrastructure Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Recent tariffs and trade restrictions under President Donald Trump's administration have temporarily cooled the artificial intelligence (AI)- fueled bull market, with the benchmark S&P 500 retreating 3.6% since the start of the year.  Fueling this expansion, U.S. and Chinese tech giants are accelerating their AI development timelines and pouring hundreds of billions into infrastructure.  This next-generation infrastructure is expected to revolutionize nearly everything, from healthcare diagnostics to autonomous transportation and personalized education.

headline: 2 Millionaire-Maker Technology Stocks to Buy
summary: When it comes to looking for millionaire-making tech stocks, your best bet is to try to find small to mid-sized growth companies that have big potential.  While these type of investment gains do occur, they are very rare.  With a $200 billion market cap, Palantir (NASDAQ: PLTR) would have to become a $20 trillion company in the next 20 to 30 years for an investor to turn $10,000 into $1 million.

headline: 1 Top Vanguard Fund That Could Turn $50,000 Into Over $1 Million
summary: The S&P 500 is down over 4% from the start of the year.  If you have $50,000 that you can afford to invest into the stock market today, I'll show you how that can turn to $1 million in the long run.  If you're investing a large lump sum, you'll want to ensure that you're putting that money into an investment that can generate good returns for you and also keep your money safe.
